title: Premium Replacement Charcoal Water Filters for Cuisinart Coffee Machines (24)
features: Premium Quality Replacment Charcoal Water Filters for Cuisinart Coffee Machines and Brewers. Replaces your Cuisinart water filter.
Removes impurities (chlorine, odors, calcium & others) that interfere with taste and quality.
Quality meets or exceeds original filter. Fits all Cuisinart machines that require a water filter.
Bulk packaged with the environment in mind, in one clear bag.
